price: [He was told], “Now [you believe]? You had always been disobedient, and were one of the mischief-makers!
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
